name: H3 Solutions
tag_list: sharepoint, mobile, microsoft, software, smartphone, mobile-sharepoint
overview: Founded in 2006, H3 Solutions is well known for its expertise in Microsoft SharePoint technologies. Working as a Microsoft Gold Certified Partner, H3 Solutions provides software consulting for major clients in both the public and private sectors. H3 Solutions is likely best known for the creation of the mobile application framework for Microsoft SharePoint, Mobile EntrÃ©eÂ®. It’s the industry’s first SharePoint-integrated development platform for mobile applications that allows cross-device deployment. H3 Solutions is based in Manassas, Virginia, and is privately held.
